specifications.Finish: Mechanical > Embossed Embossed is a fabric finish that creates a 3D effect on the surface using heat or pressure to form patterns or designs. It adds texture and depth, making the fabric more visually rich and stylish
specifications.Care Advice: Regenerated > Bamboo This fabric can shrink or become distorted if it get wet. Store it in a cool, dry, well-ventilated location.
specifications.Care Instructions: Hand wash only Wash separately Turn inside out before washing, Do not wring, Do not rub Do not bleach Flat dry Do not iron
